title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 200.6 - Engagement of counsel
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 200.6 - Engagement of counsel

State Regulations

No adjournment shall be granted on the
ground of engagement of counsel except in accordance with Part 125 of the Rules
of the Chief Administrator of the Courts (22 NYCRR Part
125
). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
200.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
